feed.title: Laminar Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Laminar news and events.

entry.title: Laminar v15.0.0 Mega Release
entry.summary: Huge release with better Airstream semantics and many new features.

entry.title: Laminar v0.14.5, Discord and More News
entry.summary: This release was built with Scala 3.2.0, which fixes Scala.js sourcemaps on 3.x.

entry.title: 2022 Laminar Ecosystem Updates
entry.summary: Here is a deluge of new libraries, web components, tutorials, sponsors â€“ all the news that couldn't wait until the next Laminar release. Hope I didn't miss anything!

entry.title: Laminar v0.13.1 & Waypoint 0.4.2
entry.summary: Fixes a regression in Laminar controlled inputs when filtering user input, and an unrelated issue with file:// URLs in Waypoint.

entry.title: Laminar v0.13.0
entry.summary:
Laminar & Airstream are now published directly for Scala 3. This required an internal refactoring of Airstream to satisfy Scala 3's stricter variance checks.

No breaking changes unless you extended / subclassed Airstream observable types.

entry.title: Laminar v0.12.2
entry.summary: Bug fixes for source maps, SVG xmlns, and XHR headers. A couple new convenience methods. Requires Scala.js 1.5.0.

entry.title: Laminar v0.12.1
entry.summary: Tiny release to remove debug logging for controlled inputs that I accidentally left in the production build of Laminar 0.12.0. No breaking changes unless this broke your heart.

entry.title: Laminar v0.12.0, Laminext, Material UI & more!
entry.summary:
Laminar v0.12.0 and Airstream v0.12.0 are out! ðŸŽ‰

This is a big release packed with new features and ergonomics improvements. Ctrl+F for "migration" in this post for directions on breaking changes. Don't worry, the "breaking" stuff is minor and mostly concerns previous misbehaviours in edge cases. Existing users, make sure to read the new / updated parts of the docs as linked below.

entry.title: Airstream v0.11.1
entry.summary:
I have just released a bugfix for Airstream which fixes #45.

If you used SwitchStreamStrategy or SwitchFutureStrategy when flatMap-ping observables (see docs for when exactly each is used), or used SwitchEventStream directly, the output stream was no...

entry.title: Laminar v0.11.0 & New Website
entry.summary:
I am pleased to announce the release of Laminar v0.11.0, Airstream v0.11.0, and our new website.

This release improves transaction scheduling in Airstream, fixes several bugs, and takes away a few obscure footguns from users.

entry.title: Previous News & Release Notes
entry.summary:
